```{r}
beds_borough<-Londonward%>%
  left_join(., 
            ward_beds,
            by=c("gss_code"="geography_code"))%>%
  group_by(lb_gss_cd, borough)%>%
  summarise(total_beds_per_borough = sum(bedrooms_all_categories_number_of_bedrooms_measures_value, na.rm = TRUE))
```
